Pre-Game Insights: The Atlanta Braves will try to keep their three-game home win streak alive when they face the Kansas City Royals.
Alec Marsh (8-9, 4.65 ERA, 1.27 WHIP, 121 strikeouts) starts for the Royals, while Charlie Morton (8-9, 4.08 ERA, 1.32 WHIP, 164 strikeouts) starts for the Braves.
Atlanta has gone 45-33 at home and 88-71 overall.
Kansas City has an 85-76 record overall and a 40-40 record in road games.
